So Others Might Live.name: So Others Might Live
So Others Might Live.flavor: Your prayer saps your enemy’s strength. You then take its attack onto yourself to protect your ally, who is healed by your sacrifice.
So Others Might Live.onHit: The target is weakened until the end of your next turn. The first time the target damages one of your allies with an attack before the end of your next turn, you take the damage instead, and that ally can spend a healing surge.

Bear the Wounds.name: Bear the Wounds
Bear the Wounds.flavor: Your ally’s injuries fade, only to reappear on your body.
Bear the Wounds.effect: Choose a number up to your bloodied value. The target regains that number of hit points, and you take the same amount of damage. You can then transfer to yourself any effect on the target that a save can end.

Martyr’s Cry.name: Martyr’s Cry
Martyr’s Cry.flavor: The wounds you suffer weaken your enemy.
Martyr’s Cry.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you bloodies you or damages you while you’re bloodied
Martyr’s Cry.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
